pkgmetadata.longdescription: Importing Data from Loligo Systems Software, Calculating Metabolic Rates and Critical Tensions // Analysis of oxygen consumption data generated by Loligo (R) Systems respirometry equipment. The package includes a function for loading data output by Loligo's 'AutoResp' software (get.witrox.data()), functions for calculating metabolic rates over user-specified time intervals, extracting critical points from data using broken stick regressions based on Yeager and Ultsch (DOI:10.1086/physzool.62.4.30157935), and easy functions for converting between different units of barometric pressure.
